original_title:
HOLY CRAP

The illegal alien truck driver who kiIIed 3 people, FAILED an English Language Assessment, getting only 2/12 answers right and identifying only 1/4 highway traffic signs.

It was also discovered that WA and CA issued Singh a commercial driver's license despite not being eligible for it.   — The Donald
article_summary: "Illegal alien truck driver who killed three people failed English and traffic sign assessments, received commercial driver's license in WA and CA despite ineligibility."</s>
